channel.title: dotnetcore on Coding with Hans
channel.description: Recent content in dotnetcore on Coding with Hans

item.title: My thoughts on C# 9.0
item.description: At the Microsoft build 2020 conference last week a lot of new and exciting announcements were made. One topic was about the new features that are added to the C# language in version 9.

item.title: C# 8.0 features
item.description: Met de komst van .NET Core 3.0 in september zet Microsoft een nieuwe stap voor het .NET platform. In mijn blog over de nieuwe features in .
